attributes.action: Create a universal SOS button for mobile phones accessible from the lock screen
attributes.additional_details:
The Titanic sank because there wasn’t (at that time ) a universal SOS message. 
In an emergency or a dangerous situation wouldn’t it be a benefit if someone, regardless of phone provider, could hit their home/ phone lock button... or a designated button... and be put straight to the police?!

One button when your phone is locked that all phone providers were in agreement with? 
One SOS button..:
attributes.background: An SOS button that is easy to activate when your phone is locked that Is universal for all mobile phone providers

rejection.details: The creation of a new mobile phone feature would be a decision for mobile phone companies, not the UK Government or Parliament.
